Issue.creator: ashutosh_kumar
Issue.summary: npm audit Prototype Pollution Vulnerability (hoek package)
Issue.description: loggly > request > hawk > hoek │ log4js > loggly > request > hawk > cryptiles > boom > hoek log4js > loggly > request > hawk > hoek log4js > loggly > request > hawk > sntp > hoek ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/566 Proposed fix is : Run npm install --save-dev log4js@4.4.0 to resolve 7 vulnerabilities SEMVER WARNING: Recommended action is a potentially breaking change >
